storyInfo: As she prepares to leave Rhodes Island, Whisperain receives a patient who is about to lose her vision to Oripathy. Whisperain wants to fulfill her wish to see a movie once more.

attributes.content: Hello, Lara.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: 'The Spire hid amongst the mist, and the rain dripped onto the thousands of umbrellas...'
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Oh, hello, Doctor.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Sorry to disturb you while you're reading. How are you feeling?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Uhh, my wounds don't hurt so much anymore, but I still get dizzy pretty often and can't see things clearly.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Have you had any problems with the IV drip? Is it comfortable? Does anything feel off?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: My arm feels kinda cold, but I got used to it.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Doctor, how many more days will I have to stay on IV?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Hm... That depends.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Will it be much longer? I wanna go out for a walk.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I've been in bed for days. Even though I haven't moved an inch, it really tires me out.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: It won't be much longer, but your wounds are still healing. We'll let you walk around once they're better.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: That said...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: The bloodwork is back for the girl who was caught in the Originium bomb blast. Her condition is clearly worsening.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: We managed to slow down the deterioration somewhat, but... *sigh*. It's an acute infection, and she had all these open wounds. We've done all the emergency treatment we could.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Based on the imaging tests, the Originium in her body is starting to put pressure on her optic nerves.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Yes, she noticed something was off herself. Her vision blurs sometimes.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Even with suppressants, we haven't yet managed to stabilize her condition. At this rate, she's likely to go blind.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: How would she react if I told her, though? Would she be able to bear it?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: If I were the one on the bed, maybe I'd think it's better to know the truth, no matter how harsh it is.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: But she doesn't know fear yet. Her long nightmare has yet to begin. If I can let her have peace of mind, even for only a few more days...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Okay, I get it. Even after I can move, the doctors will still need to observe my condition a little longer. I'll only be discharged from Rhodes Island when my Oripathy is stabilized.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: But yesterday, another doctor told me that Rhodes Island's a big ship, and I'm allowed to leave the hospital wing and visit other places as long as I take someone from medical with me.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: She even brought me a book from the library.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Right, Rhodes Island's a big place. There's a lot you can do here.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: For now though, I need to redress your wounds. Don't worry about what I'm doing and keep reading.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Is it okay if I read out loud? I don't want to hear the tweezers and medicine bottles.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Yes, of course.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: 'Having forgotten my umbrella, I saw someone standing underneath the roof of a cafe on the other side of the street... A strange woman.'
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: 'The way she is dressed is very... not with the times. With a harp in her hand, she quietly... starts singing to the rain.'
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: 'The musical notes waft toward me continuously. After a while, I finally make out the words she is singing...'
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: The words... she is singing... uhh...
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: 'Please forget about me, just like the early spring snow.'
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Sorry, I couldn't help myself.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Oh, don't be sorry.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: You should close your eyes and get some rest. Maybe you've been reading too much. Your eyes are tired, and that's why you couldn't make out the letters.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Doctor, have you read this book before?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Yes, but the movie adaptation is more famous. I've seen it several times, and I couldn't help but finish the quote when I heard it.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: What does the protagonist look like in the movie? I think of her as kind of tall with red hair, and she does this face when she talks—
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: —Wwrr!
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: D-Don't move now. The wounds on your face aren't too deep, but they still need time to heal.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I don't think the actress they cast for the movie is quite like what you had in mind.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: That said, the movie and the book are completely different stories to begin with.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: If I were you, I would finish the book first and let my imagination flourish before seeing how the movie adapted things.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Okay, I won't ask for any more spoilers then. Once I'm done with the book, I'll watch the movie myself.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Oh, but I'm Infected now... They don't let Infected into movie theaters, do they?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I used to go to the movies with Mommy. The two of us always bought a huge tub of popcorn.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: She told me to never talk during a movie. I know you have to wait till it's over before you ask about the things you didn't get.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: So I'm a good girl, right...?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Don't cry. At the very least, you can watch movies in the AV room here on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: The screens aren't as big as the ones at the theaters, but it might be the perfect size for watching a movie alone, or with a few friends.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Even if it's just immersing yourself in the movie's sounds.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: In that case, take me to see it as soon as I can get out of bed.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Eh? Me? But I...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: You're thinking of leaving Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Right. I've been here for quite a while now. Before I knew it, I'd already gotten to know everyone here so well.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: ...To the point that it's starting to scare me.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: N-Not that I'm afraid of you.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Yeah, I know.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Have you figured out when you're leaving?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I got a new patient recently. I want to wait until her condition is more stable.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Should I keep it a secret, then?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Yes, please. I don't want to tell anyone something so... depressing.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Sorry, but I'll probably be very busy, and I can't make any promises.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: No worries. I'll ask the other doctors, then.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: There, we're done. Does it feel off anywhere?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: No, not at all. Thanks.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Oh, wait up. Could you help me adjust the bookstand? I can't make out the words very well.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I think the Oripathy might've made me near-sighted.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: No, this isn't nearsightedness.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: But it's true that it will affect your vision. As for how much... we can't tell for sure yet.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: You should keep reading your books, but be sure to take a look at the beautiful scenery outside the window too.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: So the girl is going blind, but you haven't told her? And she wants to watch a movie?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Right. I couldn't bring myself to commit to anything. Telling her either the truth or a lie would be too cruel.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: But you want to make her wish come true, right?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: If I could, I'd love to watch a movie with her.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: It'd be even better if there were a ticket stub to keep. After all, it will be my last movie here on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: It's just... she might not get to see it.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: In terms of both venue and technical requirements, it's not all that hard to put together one of the relatively formal movie screenings we've held on Rhodes Island before.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: So you think I should've said yes to her?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Obviously that's for you to decide, as her doctor.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: All I'm saying is that, even if it's just for yourself, you could hold a movie screening and keep the ticket stub to commemorate your departure.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Just for myself...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: But I'm afraid I don't know who to ask to set up a temporary movie theater.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Don't worry, I can help with that. It's not in my department's usual wheelhouse, but nothing a little engineering can't solve.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: And if requiring tickets is that important to you... Right, maybe we could add an automatic ticketing machine. That way, you won't need anyone to staff it, which will probably make things easier on you.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Don't mention it. This is nothing.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I just hope it'll leave you with some pleasant memories.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Hello, Doctor.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Are you... the doctor who talks to me about movies?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Sorry, I can't see very well, so I can only try to guess by your footsteps. Sorry if I got it wrong.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: No, you got it right. Hello, Lara.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Oh, that's wonderful.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: What should I call you? Most of the doctors here have badges, but you don't.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry about my name.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: It's time to give you another checkup.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Mm. Okay.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Doctor, I'm actually a little scared.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: My eyesight is getting worse and worse, but nobody will tell me what's going on.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I know there's no cure to Oripathy, but... I'm not ready... Am I about to...?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: You're overthinking it. Your life isn't in danger, for the time being.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Your Oripathy has been gradually stabilizing, and the wounds on your legs and abdomen have healed up very well.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Once we have the results of this checkup, we'll know for sure when we can take out the stitches.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Soon, maybe in a couple of days, we can let you watch a movie.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Oh, right.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: It also just so happens that Rhodes Island will hold a movie screening soon, and it's the one that's based on the book you're reading.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Let's go see it together, once you're out of bed.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Yay! It's a promise!
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Yep, it's a promise.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Then... will you keep telling me the story during the checkup?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I want to read it myself, but it really tires me out to read now.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Close your eyes and get some rest.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, last time we got to the part where the protagonist and the wandering bard from the past reached a Leithanian nomadic city.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: She had never gone inside a nomadic city. She was terrified just from having to take the elevator at the entrance.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: The city must be a noisy place to a bard.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Yes, very. She relied on her sensitive ears to tell pitches apart, but everything was so loud in the city.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: She'd never seen instruments with Arts Units that were tuned by machines. The music they played was like a kind of Originium Art in itself. She was completely mesmerized.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Moreover, the city was very affectionate to her. Many of the Spires' masters invited her as their guest.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: But she's from the past. She has to figure out a way to go back.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Hmm... Actually, there isn't anywhere she can go back to.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: —Oh, maybe we should make this a cliffhanger! I'll find out the ending for myself when we watch the movie.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: ...Right, Lara.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: When we watch the movie, aside from what's on the screen, there will be lots of sounds, too.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Like the bard strumming her instrument and singing, the chirping of the fowlbeasts, the winds blowing through the vast forest as they travel, and the rain that falls on the forest hut's roof.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: And since we'll be watching the movie in the AV room, we can talk quietly to each other.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: So if there's anything that you can't see well, I can tell you what's going on.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Whisperain, come get some rest. Would you like some blueberry raisins?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: I appreciate the offer, but no thanks. After I look at Lara's results, I still have other patients to take care of.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Don't be so focused on taking care of others that you forget to take care of yourself. Your body isn't in great condition either, and needs rest.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Thanks, but you don't have to worry about me so much.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Right, you said you'll bring Lara to a movie. Is it the screening on Saturday?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Have you told her about the worst case scenario yet? She might have to enjoy the movie through sound alone by then.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: I... I haven't. She's been really looking forward to it these last few days. I don't want to dampen her spirits.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Yeah, I guess. Whatever the case, letting her do these little things she did before the accident will probably alleviate some stress.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Once her condition stabilizes, I'll bring her some snacks and have a chat with her.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Oh, and I'll bring some for you too, of course. Just be sure to actually have some next time!
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Next time? ...Sure, thank you.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Right, so I've asked all the operators I see in the break room to go to the screening this weekend.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: It'll feel more like a movie theater with a bigger crowd, right? It should help the patients rebuild the confidence to interact with others, too.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Right, thank you. I'll always remember my time here at—
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: —Hold on, Dr. Honeyberry. Take a look at this.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Hurry! The movie's about to start!
Who put this together?
Hm... I can't tell, but Honeyberry's the one who suggested I come.
There were no leaflets or notices, and it seems they put a mini-theater together in the AV room in just one night.
No one's checking tickets at the door either. It's all printed by a self-service ticketing machine.
But if we can print tickets, that's gotta mean we can go in and watch, right? It doesn't say anywhere we can't, right?
I've been curious about this movie for a while now. I've wanted to watch it ever since I read Whisperain's review.
Yeah, me too!
Lara, be careful.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: It's okay, Doctor. It's a little dark, but I can still see the steps with how high they are!
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Huh? This place really feels like a movie theater. There are so many people... Is it really okay for me to go inside?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Don't worry. You've been coming into contact with so many people every day. You won't spread Oripathy to them.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: I'll sit in the front row, then.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: It's such a big screen... I can see everything so clearly like this.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Doctor, you don't have to stay with me if you're busy. I'll find my way back to my room.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: No, please. Let me stay and watch the story again.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: —Hold on, Dr. Honeyberry. Take a look at this.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Going by these imaging results, the spread of Originium inside Lara's body is... under control.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Wow, you're right!
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Now you two can watch the movie together with no issues!
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Are you still worried about something?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: If there's anything on your mind, you can tell me. It doesn't matter if it's happy or sad, it always feels better if you talk to someone about it.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'm a certified counselor. It won't be a burden for me.
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: Besides, how would you know how others will react if you never tell anyone?
attributes.name: Honeyberry

attributes.content: I don't think I understood the movie's ending, but it gave me this kinda weird feeling.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Huh? Doctor, are you crying?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. It stirs my emotions every time I hear the credits theme.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: There are a lot of different interpretations of the ending. Even I see it differently depending on my mood.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Then I guess I should see it again when I get older.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Thank you for staying with me all this time, Doctor.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Hold on, Lara.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Sorry, but there's something very important that I haven't told you yet.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: As you've noticed, your vision is deteriorating because of your condition.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: It's under control for the time being, but as long as you have Oripathy, Originium will inevitably eat away at your body.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: So you mean... I won't be able to see anything?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Right... I can't say for sure when you'll go blind, but it will happen eventually. All too soon.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Actually, I kind of figured.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I'm sorry that I've been keeping it from you.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: No worries, Doctor. I've already given it a lot of thought. Actually, I'd even mentally prepared myself for not being able to watch the movie.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: That's why, for the past few days, I've been trying my best to keep my eyes wide open. To remember all the streets, houses, flowers, and grass that I see, how blue the sky is and how white the snow.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I don't know when Oripathy will make my body hurt again... or when I'll wake up one morning and not be able to see.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: But until then, I want to try my best to remember everything that I come across.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: I want to remember everyone that I like too, everyone who takes care of me.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: That way, when I hear their names, I'll remember how they look.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: So even if things do turn out the way I just said, and I slowly forget everything like my old grandpa who doesn't remember who I am...
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Even if there comes a day...
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Even if there comes a day I hear a movie's title but don't remember what it means to me.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Just like the wandering bard who disappears into the rain at the end of the movie. She too once danced in this era's rain.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. I finished your sentence again.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: But that's exactly how I feel.
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Oh, right, about the ending. Do you think the bard went back in the end? Or do you think she stayed with us?
attributes.name: Lara

attributes.content: Well, what I think is...
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: Oh, that's the girl I always see in the AV room.
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: ...I'm going to borrow the AV room to watch 'Drifting Memories' next Saturday.
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Want to join me?
attributes.name: Robin

attributes.content: Next Saturday?
attributes.name: Whisperain

attributes.content: ...I'd love to. Thanks for inviting me.
attributes.name: Whisperain
